title: St Regis / Luxury Hotels
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20090904133346im_/http:/typophile.com/files/strpms_6137.59706.jpg)

anyone know the logo font?

and the one used for the initials in the upper ornament? or one that comes close?

thanks!
author: flabrea

comments.content:
Has a feeling of ’Engravers MT”.

I was able to find [Engravers D](http://web.archive.org/web/20090904133346/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/engravers/?testdrive=custom%3D0%26seed%3D21%26dock%3D0%26size%3D71%26w%3D720%26src%3Dcustom%26text%3DREGIS%26fg%3D000000%26bg%3Dffffff%26goodies%3Dsingle%252Cot.liga) from URW++ and [Great Western](http://web.archive.org/) from FontMesa that are similar. Not an exact match but something in the ballpark.
